features: OFFICIAL THE FLASH MOVIE FIGURE: Sprint into action with the iconic The Flash action figures! Build your collection with The Flash, Dark Flash, and Batman (each sold separately)!

12-INCH ACTION FIGURE: With 11 points of articulation, the poseable joints allow for full range of posing, dynamic pretend play and display, letting kids recreate their favorite scenes from the movie.
AUTHENTIC MOVIE STYLING: This articulated action figure is highly detailed, featuring a detailed sculpt and movie-styling, as seen in The Flash movie!
COLLECT THEM ALL: Bring the excitement and adventure of The Flash home! Add heroes and villains like The Flash, Dark Flash, Batman and Young Barry to your DC collection.
GREAT GIFTS FOR KIDS: Kids love to create their own Super Hero adventures with The Flash toy figures & playsets! Super Hero toys are great for kids who love to pretend play and use their imagination!
Covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment. See below for full details
body.description: Super-Villains don’t stand a chance against The Flash action figures! Sprint into action with the The Flash 12-inch Action Figures! Each action figure features 11 points of articulation and detailed movie styling that brings your favorite The Flash figures to life! Kids love to engage their imagination and create their own The Flash battles! The fate of the world is in your hands. With a range of cool toys for boys and girls to collect from The Flash movie, you can now expand your DC action figures with The Flash, Dark Flash, Batman action figure, and more (each sold separately). These toys for girls and boys gifts are perfect for kids that love Justice League collectible figurines, DC multiverse, Super Hero movies collectibles, RC cars, and more! Bring your favorite The Flash characters home with The Flash 12-inch Action Figures!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Flash Action Figure Sprint into action with The Flash 12-inch Action Figures (each sold separately)! The action figure features 11 points of articulation and detailed movie styling that brings your favorite The Flash figure to life! Includes 12-inch Flash Action Figure

STORYTELLING AND IMAGINATION Sprint into action with the iconic The Flash action figure! Kids love to use their creativity and storytelling skills to play out endless imaginative adventures! EASY TO POSE With 11 points of articulation, the poseable joints allow for full range of posing and dynamic pretend play and display! COLLECT THEM ALL Build your collection with The Flash, Batman, and more (each sold separately)!
Great Gift for Super Hero Fans The Flash action figures are on the top of kids' wishlists! Gift Super Hero enthusiasts the excitement of The Flash!

The Flash Ultimate Figure Set Speed Force The Flash Action Figure The Flash Ultimate Batwing Set The Flash Batwing Battle Set 1989 Batmobile RC The Flash Hero Set, Iconic Mask with Visor and Ring AGE 3+ 4+ 3+ 3+ 14+ 4+ ABOUT Collect all 5 action figures from The Flash in this Amazon Exclusive, including The Flash, Batman, The Flash Young Barry, General Zod and Supergirl! The 12-inch Speed Force The Flash action figure comes with full armor and lightning speed action features! Press Flash’s chest logo or shake to activate unique light patterns across his suit and sounds. Open up the cockpit and place The Flash and Batman into the epic Batwing vehicle. Pull up the landing gear and get defend the world against chaos! The Flash Batwing Battle Set is a must-have for DC fans – featuring The Flash, Supergirl, and an exclusive Nam-Ek. Team up the iconic heroes and take down enemies! The limited edition 1989 Batmobile RC comes to life with dynamic light-up headlights, water-activated smoke effects - perfect experience to replicate iconic scenes from the movie Suit up as the fastest kid on earth with The Flash Hero Set, including an iconic light-up The Flash mask and ring! INCLUDES 5 Figures with Accessories 1 Speed Force The Flash Figure 2 Figures, Batwing 3 Figures, Batwing 1 Batmobile RC, 1 Charging Base, 1 4-inch Batman Figure, 1 Water Dropper, 2 AAA Batteries The Flash Mask, The Flash Ring

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Batman Shampoo Bottle type Figure.
reviews.reviewText: No shampoo, thats just the nickname of the plastic style of figure. Has 4 joints, legs and arms move, has a nice cloth cape. Looks like 89 Batman, so thats cool. Stands well on a shel, does not fall over. I am a Batman fan, and love cheaper Batman collectibles. Would get the expensive stuff, but this looks just as good for a lot less. Connected to the new Flash Movie. I see no flaws or reason not to get in. He may look a tad skinnier than actual character in real life. But looks nice with the other collectibles. At 12 inches, stands as tall as most of my others in collection. He stands tall and straight, no fancy poses or karate style action. But still nice for the price! Consider this if you know someone who is a fan, or if you are a fan. I got it for $11. Good price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid Batman Figure For The Price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this figure for the nostalgia of seeing Michael Keaton reprising his role as Batman in The Flash movie. It also reminded me of a 12-inch Batman Returns figure produced by Applause that a childhood friend of mine had owned, of which I was very envious. For a basic 12-inch figure at $10-$11, it is quite good. It has some nice articulation, but including a cut waist or ankle joints would have been a welcome improvement. There are no accessories, which isn't surprising for a cheaper figure like this one. The Michael Keaton likeness is better than McFarlane's 6-inch figure. As the figure is almost entirely black, the only areas with paint are the eyes, lower face, and yellow chest logo. But at the price point and as a figure intended for younger children, the paint application can be hit-or-miss, particularly on the yellow chest logo where the paint can be a little off-center, have small unpainted spots, or some paint bleed at the borders of the logo. The plastic seems stiff and rigid, but my figure sustained a very small dent when it fell from its shelf and landed onto a metal chair. The cape is made of fabric instead of a thin ribbon-like plastic, but it would look a little better if it were a little longer and wider with maybe a couple pleats. But even with its flaws and areas that could be improved, it's still a solid, worthwhile figure to purchase when you take into consideration the intended audience and the price tag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Did you know that Flash can dodge Nerf bullets? He can! He is the only one that doesn't fall when hit with Nerf!!!! My grandsons have 7 of the figures and are hit with Nerf. Flash can withstand!!!! My grandson loves it!
